arithmetic.name: Add
arithmetic.description: 加法运算，将两个寄存器的值相加

arithmetic.name: Subtract
arithmetic.description: 减法运算，从第一个操作数减去第二个操作数

arithmetic.name: Multiply
arithmetic.description: 乘法运算，两个寄存器值相乘

arithmetic.name: Multiply-Add
arithmetic.description: 乘加运算，Xd = Xa + Xn * Xm

arithmetic.name: Multiply-Subtract
arithmetic.description: 乘减运算，Xd = Xa - Xn * Xm

arithmetic.name: Signed Multiply Long
arithmetic.description: 有符号长乘法，结果为64位

arithmetic.name: Unsigned Multiply Long
arithmetic.description: 无符号长乘法，结果为64位

arithmetic.name: Add with Carry
arithmetic.description: 带进位加法，Xd = Xn + Xm + C

logical.name: Bitwise Bit Clear
logical.description: 位清除运算，Xd = Xn AND NOT Xm

logical.name: Bitwise OR NOT
logical.description: 按位或非运算，Xd = Xn OR NOT Xm

logical.name: Bitwise Exclusive OR NOT
logical.description: 按位异或非运算，Xd = Xn EOR NOT Xm

bitfield.name: Bitfield Move
bitfield.description: 位域移动（保持目标寄存器其他位不变）

reverse.name: Count Leading Sign bits
reverse.description: 计算前导符号位的数量

load.name: Load Register
load.description: 从内存加载数据到寄存器

load.name: Load Register Byte
load.description: 从内存加载一个字节到寄存器

load.name: Load Register Halfword
load.description: 从内存加载半字（16位）到寄存器

load.name: Load Pair of Registers
load.description: 从内存加载两个寄存器

load.name: Load Register Signed Byte
load.description: 从内存加载有符号字节并扩展

load.name: Load Register Signed Halfword
load.description: 从内存加载有符号半字并扩展

load.name: Load Register Signed Word
load.description: 从内存加载有符号字（32位）并扩展到64位

load.name: Load Register (Unscaled)
load.description: 从内存加载数据（非缩放偏移）

load.name: Load Exclusive Register
load.description: 独占加载（用于原子操作）

load.name: Load-Acquire Register
load.description: 带获取语义的加载（内存屏障）

store.name: Store Register
store.description: 将寄存器数据存储到内存

store.name: Store Register Byte
store.description: 将寄存器的一个字节存储到内存

store.name: Store Register Halfword
store.description: 将寄存器的半字（16位）存储到内存

store.name: Store Pair of Registers
store.description: 将两个寄存器存储到内存

store.name: Store Register (Unscaled)
store.description: 将寄存器存储到内存（非缩放偏移）

store.name: Store Exclusive Register
store.description: 独占存储（用于原子操作）

store.name: Store-Release Register
store.description: 带释放语义的存储（内存屏障）

store.name: Store Register Halfword
store.description: 将寄存器的半字（16位）存储到内存

store.name: Store Pair of Registers
store.description: 将两个寄存器存储到内存

unconditional.name: Branch
unconditional.description: 无条件跳转到指定标签

unconditional.name: Branch with Link
unconditional.description: 跳转并保存返回地址到X30（链接寄存器）

unconditional.name: Branch to Register
unconditional.description: 跳转到寄存器中的地址

unconditional.name: Return from subroutine
unconditional.description: 从子程序返回，默认使用X30

conditional.name: Branch if Carry Set
conditional.description: 如果进位标志置位则跳转（C=1）

conditional.name: Branch if Carry Clear
conditional.description: 如果进位标志清零则跳转（C=0）

conditional.name: Branch if Plus
conditional.description: 如果结果为正或零则跳转（N=0）

conditional.name: Branch if Overflow Set
conditional.description: 如果溢出标志置位则跳转（V=1）

conditional.name: Branch if Overflow Clear
conditional.description: 如果溢出标志清零则跳转（V=0）

conditional.name: Branch if Higher (unsigned)
conditional.description: 无符号大于时跳转（C=1 且 Z=0）

conditional.name: Branch if Lower or Same (unsigned)
conditional.description: 无符号小于等于时跳转（C=0 或 Z=1）

conditional.name: Branch if Greater or Equal (signed)
conditional.description: 有符号大于等于时跳转（N=V）

conditional.name: Branch if Greater Than (signed)
conditional.description: 有符号大于时跳转（Z=0 且 N=V）

conditional.name: Branch if Less or Equal (signed)
conditional.description: 有符号小于等于时跳转（Z=1 或 N!=V）

compare_and_branch.name: Compare and Branch if Zero
compare_and_branch.description: 如果寄存器值为零则跳转

compare_and_branch.name: Compare and Branch if Not Zero
compare_and_branch.description: 如果寄存器值不为零则跳转

comparison.name: Compare
comparison.description: 比较两个值，设置条件标志（相当于 SUB 但不保存结果）

comparison.name: Compare Negative
comparison.description: 比较和负数，设置条件标志（相当于 ADD 但不保存结果）

comparison.name: Test bits
comparison.description: 测试位（相当于 AND 但不保存结果）

move.name: Move with Zero
move.description: 移动立即数并将其他位清零

move.name: Move with Keep
move.description: 移动立即数但保持其他位不变

system.name: No Operation
system.description: 空操作，不执行任何动作

system.name: Supervisor Call
system.description: 系统调用，触发异常进入操作系统

system.name: Data Memory Barrier
system.description: 数据内存屏障，确保内存访问顺序

system.name: Move to Register from System
system.description: 从系统寄存器读取到通用寄存器

system.name: Move to System from Register
system.description: 从通用寄存器写入到系统寄存器

arithmetic.name: Floating-point Multiply-Add
arithmetic.description: 浮点乘加，Sd = Sa + Sn * Sm

arithmetic.name: Floating-point Multiply-Subtract
arithmetic.description: 浮点乘减，Sd = Sa - Sn * Sm

conversion.name: Floating-point Convert to Signed integer, round toward Zero
conversion.description: 浮点转有符号整数（向零舍入）

conversion.name: Floating-point Convert to Unsigned integer, round toward Zero
conversion.description: 浮点转无符号整数（向零舍入）

move.name: Floating-point Move
move.description: 浮点寄存器间移动或加载立即数

move.name: Floating-point Move to/from general register
move.description: 浮点寄存器与通用寄存器间移动

arithmetic.name: Vector Multiply-Accumulate
arithmetic.description: 向量乘累加，Vd = Vd + Vn * Vm

arithmetic.name: Vector Multiply-Subtract
arithmetic.description: 向量乘减，Vd = Vd - Vn * Vm

load_store.name: Load one single-element structure
load_store.description: 加载单个向量元素结构

load_store.name: Store one single-element structure
load_store.description: 存储单个向量元素结构

load_store.name: Load two single-element structures
load_store.description: 加载两个向量元素结构

load_store.name: Store two single-element structures
load_store.description: 存储两个向量元素结构

special_registers.name: Move to Register from System register
special_registers.description: 从系统寄存器读取到通用寄存器

special_registers.name: Move to System register from Register
special_registers.description: 从通用寄存器写入到系统寄存器

addressing_modes.name: Extended register offset
addressing_modes.description: 基址加扩展寄存器偏移

load_store.name: Atomic Add
load_store.description: 原子加法，将Xs的值加到内存[Xn]，原值加载到Xt

load_store.name: Atomic Add (Acquire, Release)
load_store.description: 带获取-释放语义的原子加法

load_store.name: Atomic Clear
load_store.description: 原子清除位，将[Xn] AND NOT Xs的结果存回内存，原值加载到Xt

load_store.name: Atomic Exclusive OR
load_store.description: 原子异或，将[Xn] XOR Xs的结果存回内存

load_store.name: Atomic Set
load_store.description: 原子置位，将[Xn] OR Xs的结果存回内存

load_store.name: Swap
load_store.description: 原子交换，将Xs的值存入[Xn]，原值加载到Xt

load_store.name: Compare and Swap
load_store.description: 比较并交换，如果[Xn]等于Xs则将Xt存入[Xn]

load_store.name: Compare and Swap (Acquire, Release)
load_store.description: 带获取-释放语义的比较并交换

reduction.name: Signed Maximum across Vector
reduction.description: 有符号向量元素求最大值

reduction.name: Signed Minimum across Vector
reduction.description: 有符号向量元素求最小值

reduction.name: Unsigned Maximum across Vector
reduction.description: 无符号向量元素求最大值

permute.name: Extract
permute.description: 从两个向量中提取元素并连接

permute.name: Zip vectors (primary)
permute.description: 交错合并向量（低半部分）

permute.name: Zip vectors (secondary)
permute.description: 交错合并向量（高半部分）

table_lookup.name: Table Lookup
table_lookup.description: 表查找，根据索引从表中查找元素

table_lookup.name: Table Lookup Extension
table_lookup.description: 表查找扩展，索引越界时保留原值

pointer_authentication.name: Pointer Authentication Code for Instruction address
pointer_authentication.description: 为指令地址生成指针认证码

pointer_authentication.name: Pointer Authentication Code for Data address
pointer_authentication.description: 为数据地址生成指针认证码

pointer_authentication.name: Authenticate Instruction address
pointer_authentication.description: 验证指令地址的指针认证码

pointer_authentication.name: Authenticate Data address
pointer_authentication.description: 验证数据地址的指针认证码

conditional_operations.name: 条件操作指令
conditional_operations.description: 根据条件标志位执行选择、递增、取反等操作

instructions.name: Conditional Select
instructions.description: 条件选择，如果条件为真选择Xn，否则选择Xm

instructions.name: Conditional Select Increment
instructions.description: 条件选择并递增，如果条件为真选择Xn，否则选择Xm+1

instructions.name: Conditional Select Invert
instructions.description: 条件选择并取反，如果条件为真选择Xn，否则选择NOT Xm

instructions.name: Conditional Select Negate
instructions.description: 条件选择并取负，如果条件为真选择Xn，否则选择-Xm

instructions.name: Conditional Set
instructions.description: 条件设置，如果条件为真设置为1，否则为0（CSINC的别名）

instructions.name: Conditional Set Mask
instructions.description: 条件设置掩码，如果条件为真设置为全1，否则为0（CSINV的别名）

instructions.name: Conditional Increment
instructions.description: 条件递增，如果条件为真则Xd=Xn+1，否则Xd=Xn（CSINC的别名）

instructions.name: Conditional Invert
instructions.description: 条件取反，如果条件为真则Xd=NOT Xn，否则Xd=Xn（CSINV的别名）

instructions.name: Conditional Negate
instructions.description: 条件取负，如果条件为真则Xd=-Xn，否则Xd=Xn（CSNEG的别名）

instructions.name: Conditional Compare
instructions.description: 条件比较，如果条件为真则比较Xn和Xm并设置标志位，否则设置nzcv标志

instructions.name: Conditional Compare Negative
instructions.description: 条件负比较，如果条件为真则比较Xn和-Xm并设置标志位，否则设置nzcv标志

pc_relative_addressing.name: PC相对地址计算
pc_relative_addressing.description: 基于程序计数器计算地址，用于访问全局数据和位置无关代码

instructions.name: Address to Register
instructions.description: 将PC相对地址加载到寄存器（±1MB范围）

instructions.name: Address of Page to Register
instructions.description: 将PC相对页地址（4KB对齐）加载到寄存器（±4GB范围），常用于访问GOT/PLT

bitfield_operations.name: 位域操作指令
bitfield_operations.description: 高效的位域提取、插入和操作

instructions.name: Unsigned Bitfield Insert in Zero
instructions.description: 无符号位域插入零，从Xn的低位提取width位，左移lsb位后插入Xd，其余位清零

instructions.name: Signed Bitfield Insert in Zero
instructions.description: 有符号位域插入零，从Xn的低位提取width位（符号扩展），左移lsb位后插入Xd

instructions.name: Extract Register
instructions.description: 从两个寄存器拼接的值中提取位域，Xd = (Xn:Xm) >> lsb

floating_point_advanced.name: 浮点高级指令
floating_point_advanced.description: 浮点融合乘加、转换、取整等高性能指令

instructions.name: Floating-point Fused Multiply-Add
instructions.description: 浮点融合乘加，Vd = Vd + Vn * Vm（向量或标量），单指令高精度

instructions.name: Floating-point Fused Multiply-Subtract
instructions.description: 浮点融合乘减，Vd = Vd - Vn * Vm（向量或标量）

instructions.name: Floating-point Minimum
instructions.description: 浮点最小值，选择两个浮点数中的较小值

instructions.name: Floating-point Maximum
instructions.description: 浮点最大值，选择两个浮点数中的较大值

instructions.name: Floating-point Minimum Number
instructions.description: 浮点最小值（优先选择非NaN值）

instructions.name: Floating-point Maximum Number
instructions.description: 浮点最大值（优先选择非NaN值）

instructions.name: Floating-point Convert to Signed (Round to Nearest)
instructions.description: 浮点转有符号整数（四舍五入到最近）

instructions.name: Floating-point Convert to Unsigned (Round to Nearest)
instructions.description: 浮点转无符号整数（四舍五入到最近）

instructions.name: Floating-point Convert to Signed (Round towards -∞)
instructions.description: 浮点转有符号整数（向下舍入）

instructions.name: Floating-point Convert to Unsigned (Round towards -∞)
instructions.description: 浮点转无符号整数（向下舍入）

instructions.name: Floating-point Convert to Signed (Round to Nearest, ties to Even)
instructions.description: 浮点转有符号整数（四舍五入，偶数舍入）

instructions.name: Floating-point Convert to Unsigned (Round to Nearest, ties to Even)
instructions.description: 浮点转无符号整数（四舍五入，偶数舍入）

instructions.name: Floating-point Convert to Signed (Round towards +∞)
instructions.description: 浮点转有符号整数（向上舍入）

instructions.name: Floating-point Convert to Unsigned (Round towards +∞)
instructions.description: 浮点转无符号整数（向上舍入）

instructions.name: Floating-point Round to Integral (Round to Nearest)
instructions.description: 浮点取整（四舍五入到最近整数）

instructions.name: Floating-point Round to Integral (Current rounding mode)
instructions.description: 浮点取整（使用当前舍入模式）

instructions.name: Floating-point Round to Integral (Round towards -∞)
instructions.description: 浮点取整（向下舍入到整数）

instructions.name: Floating-point Round to Integral (Round to Nearest, ties to Even)
instructions.description: 浮点取整（四舍五入，偶数舍入）

instructions.name: Floating-point Round to Integral (Round towards +∞)
instructions.description: 浮点取整（向上舍入到整数）

instructions.name: Floating-point Round to Integral Exact
instructions.description: 浮点精确取整（可能引发不精确异常）

instructions.name: Floating-point Round to Integral (Round towards Zero)
instructions.description: 浮点取整（向零舍入，截断）

simd_data_processing.name: SIMD 数据处理指令
simd_data_processing.description: 向量元素操作、累加、最值等高级 SIMD 指令

instructions.name: Unsigned Add Long across Vector
instructions.description: 无符号向量累加（扩展），将向量所有元素累加到标量寄存器

instructions.name: Signed Add Long across Vector
instructions.description: 有符号向量累加（扩展），将向量所有元素累加到标量寄存器

instructions.name: Unsigned Minimum across Vector
instructions.description: 无符号向量最小值，从向量中找出最小元素

instructions.name: Insert vector element from general-purpose register
instructions.description: 从通用寄存器插入元素到向量的指定位置

instructions.name: Duplicate vector element
instructions.description: 复制向量元素或标量到整个向量

instructions.name: Unzip vectors (even elements)
instructions.description: 向量解交错（提取偶数位置元素）

instructions.name: Transpose vectors (odd elements)
instructions.description: 向量转置（提取奇数位置元素）

instructions.name: Population Count per byte
instructions.description: 按字节统计1的个数（popcount），常用于位操作优化

instructions.name: Signed saturating Add
instructions.description: 有符号饱和加法，溢出时钳位到最大/最小值

instructions.name: Unsigned saturating Add
instructions.description: 无符号饱和加法，溢出时钳位到最大值

instructions.name: Signed saturating Subtract
instructions.description: 有符号饱和减法，溢出时钳位到最大/最小值

instructions.name: Unsigned saturating Subtract
instructions.description: 无符号饱和减法，下溢时钳位到0

instructions.name: Shift Left
instructions.description: 向量逻辑左移，每个元素左移指定位数

instructions.name: Signed Shift Right
instructions.description: 向量有符号右移（算术移位）

instructions.name: Unsigned Shift Right
instructions.description: 向量无符号右移（逻辑移位）

instructions.name: Signed Extend Long
instructions.description: 有符号扩展（窄元素扩展为宽元素）

instructions.name: Unsigned Extend Long
instructions.description: 无符号扩展（窄元素扩展为宽元素）

atomic_operations_extended.name: 原子操作扩展指令
atomic_operations_extended.description: 字节、半字级别的原子操作和不返回值的原子操作

instructions.name: Atomic Add (Halfword)
instructions.description: 原子加法（半字），将Ws的值加到内存[Xn]，原值加载到Wt

instructions.name: Atomic Add (Byte)
instructions.description: 原子加法（字节），将Ws的值加到内存[Xn]，原值加载到Wt

instructions.name: Atomic Add (Halfword, Release)
instructions.description: 原子加法（半字，带释放语义）

instructions.name: Atomic Add (Byte, Release)
instructions.description: 原子加法（字节，带释放语义）

instructions.name: Compare and Swap (Acquire)
instructions.description: 比较并交换（带获取语义）

instructions.name: Compare and Swap Byte
instructions.description: 比较并交换（字节）

instructions.name: Compare and Swap Halfword
instructions.description: 比较并交换（半字）

instructions.name: Compare and Swap Pair
instructions.description: 比较并交换寄存器对（128位原子操作）

instructions.name: Atomic Add (no return)
instructions.description: 原子加法（不返回原值），将Ws的值加到内存[Xn]

instructions.name: Atomic Add (no return, Release)
instructions.description: 原子加法（不返回原值，带释放语义）

instructions.name: Atomic Add Byte (no return)
instructions.description: 原子加法（字节，不返回原值）

instructions.name: Atomic Add Halfword (no return)
instructions.description: 原子加法（半字，不返回原值）

load_store_exclusive_extended.name: 加载/存储独占扩展
load_store_exclusive_extended.description: 独占访问指令的字节、半字变体，用于实现细粒度原子操作

instructions.name: Load Exclusive Register Byte
instructions.description: 独占加载（字节），标记内存为独占访问

instructions.name: Load Exclusive Register Halfword
instructions.description: 独占加载（半字），标记内存为独占访问

instructions.name: Store Exclusive Register Byte
instructions.description: 独占存储（字节），如果独占访问成功则Ws=0，否则Ws=1

instructions.name: Store Exclusive Register Halfword
instructions.description: 独占存储（半字），如果独占访问成功则Ws=0，否则Ws=1

instructions.name: Load-Acquire Exclusive Register Byte
instructions.description: 独占加载（字节，带获取语义）

instructions.name: Load-Acquire Exclusive Register Halfword
instructions.description: 独占加载（半字，带获取语义）

instructions.name: Store-Release Exclusive Register Byte
instructions.description: 独占存储（字节，带释放语义）

instructions.name: Store-Release Exclusive Register Halfword
instructions.description: 独占存储（半字，带释放语义）

instructions.name: Load Exclusive Pair
instructions.description: 独占加载寄存器对（128位原子操作）

instructions.name: Store Exclusive Pair
instructions.description: 独占存储寄存器对（128位原子操作）

exception_handling.name: 异常处理指令
exception_handling.description: 异常返回和调试相关指令

instructions.name: Exception Return
instructions.description: 从异常返回，恢复SPSR_ELx到PSTATE，跳转到ELR_ELx

instructions.name: Debug Restore Process State
instructions.description: 调试状态恢复，从调试异常返回

instruction_encoding.description: AArch64 指令编码为 32 位定长指令
instruction_encoding.format: 每条指令占用 4 字节（32位）
